name: Before Dark (SEGARIO)
description:
BEFORE DARK is a game where you have to find the end of a procedurally generated maze. The more the time passes, the more the lights go down. 

FIND THE END OF THE MAZE BEFORE THE DARK

On your path, you will find monsters that live in the dark. You will sometimes have to kill them if you want to pass.

Controls:

Arrows: Move

Space: Attack

I challenged myself by doing a game in only 24 hours. I started from scratch and made everything all by myself.
